snippet: The Pontifical Catholic University has refused to change its name or to enact other changes that would give the church more control over its operations.
abstract: Pontifical Catholic University in Lima, Peru, has refused to change its name or to enact other changes that would give the Roman Catholic Church more control over its operations, defying its critics, who say that it has strayed from church orthodoxy; fight over the name of the university is part of a fierce battle over academic freedom and the authority of the Vatican that is unfolding in the country.

byline.original: By WILLIAM NEUMAN and ANDREA ZARATE

lead_paragraph: The Pontifical Catholic University has refused to change its name or to enact other changes that would give the church more control over its operations.

headline.seo: Catholic Church and University in Peru Fight Over Name
headline.main: Catholic Church and University in Peru Fight Over Name
headline.print_headline: Catholic Church and University in Peru Fight Over Name
